# Blazing Astro MCP Server

An MCP server that provides astrological data using the [kerykeion](https://github.com/g-battaglia/kerykeion) library.

## Installation

Run directly with `uvx`:

```bash
uvx blazing-astro
```

## Features

- **Natal Charts**: Calculate birth charts.
- **Synastry**: Calculate relationship compatibility.
- **Transits**: Check current planetary transits against a birth chart.
- **Persistence**: Save and manage subject birth data.
